unnormalised: **Smart Meter Rollout Gathers Momentum in Uttar Pradesh**
normalised: **Smart Meter Rollout Gathers Momentum in Uttar Pradesh**

unnormalised: Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh – Uttar Pradesh Power Corporation Limited (UPPCL) is accelerating the deployment of smart meters across the state, aiming to improve billing accuracy and reduce transmission losses. As of 10/26/2023, over 5 lakh smart meters have been installed, with a target of reaching 25 lakh by the end of 2024.
normalised: Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh – Uttar Pradesh Power Corporation Limited (U P P C L) is accelerating the deployment of smart meters across the state, aiming to improve billing accuracy and reduce transmission losses. As of twenty sixth october two thousand and twenty three, over five lakh smart meters have been installed, with a target of reaching twenty five lakh by the end of two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: The initiative is part of the Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme (RDSS), a central government project aimed at modernizing the power distribution network. Initial data suggests a significant reduction in Aggregate Technical & Commercial (AT&C) losses in areas where smart meters are operational.
normalised: The initiative is part of the Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme (R D S S), a central government project aimed at modernizing the power distribution network. Initial data suggests a significant reduction in Aggregate Technical and Commercial (A T and C) losses in areas where smart meters are operational.

unnormalised: "The real-time data provided by these meters is invaluable," stated Mr. Sharma, UPPCL Chairman, during a press conference at 14:00 hrs on 10/25/2023. Consumers are also benefiting from the ability to monitor their energy consumption patterns via a dedicated mobile app.
normalised: "The real-time data provided by these meters is invaluable," stated Mister Sharma, U P P C L Chairman, during a press conference at two P M on twenty fifth october two thousand and twenty three. Consumers are also benefiting from the ability to monitor their energy consumption patterns via a dedicated mobile app.

unnormalised: However, some concerns have been raised regarding data privacy and meter accuracy. UPPCL has assured consumers that robust security measures are in place and that all meters are subject to rigorous testing and certification. A consumer awareness campaign is planned for Diwali, starting on 11/12/2023, to address these concerns.
normalised: However, some concerns have been raised regarding data privacy and meter accuracy. U P P C L has assured consumers that robust security measures are in place and that all meters are subject to rigorous testing and certification. A consumer awareness campaign is planned for Diwali, starting on twelfth november two thousand and twenty three, to address these concerns.
